dt-option.name: pagingTag
dt-option.summary: Set the tag to use for the paging control.
dt-option.description:
DataTables 1.x uses the `-tag a` element for the pagination control elements. DataTables 2 will use a `-tag button` element to help improve accessability. During the transition period you can use this option to control which tag will be used.
This will affect only the standard DataTables styling (e.g. for Bootstrap etc, it will have no affect). Additionally, when DataTables 2 is released this option will have no affect, with `-tag button` elements always being used.
